feed.title: Docker Controller Bot Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Docker Controller Bot: v3.7.0
entry.content:
[NEW] /donors command now will show the name of the donors of Docker-Controller-Bot (may take up to 24h to appear after donation)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgongut/docker-controller-bot/compare/v3.6.0...v3.7.0

entry.title: New release for Docker Controller Bot: v3.8.0
entry.content:
[NEW] Wizard update notification [FIX] Now mute messages are under EXTENDED_MESSAGES [FIX] Adjusted translations [FIX] Updated libraries [FIX] Added feedback buttons to avoid loading message bar in Telegram

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgongut/docker-controller-bot/compare/v3.7.0...v3.8.0

entry.title: New release for Docker Controller Bot: v3.9.0
entry.content:
[NEW] Added /exec command to run commands inside containers. [NEW] /schedule now supports storing EXEC commands. [NEW] /updateall now features the new update progress screen. [FIX] Minor cosmetic fixes.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgongut/docker-controller-bot/compare/v3.8.0...v3.9.0

entry.title: New release for Docker Controller Bot: v3.9.1
New release for Docker Controller Bot: v3.9.2
entry.content:
[FIX] Now when the users execute a command with a large output, the output is splitted in several messages (maximum of telegram message is 4000 characters) [FIX] Some commands failed due to it wasn't interpreted as a single command. Now it will work [FIX] Now if a command didn't return anything I've put a message of confirmation

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgongut/docker-controller-bot/compare/v3.9.1...v3.9.2
